description: Renders a Mustache template and returns rendered text.

input.name: template
input.description:
A mustache (https://mustache.github.io/) template.
A mustache template is a string that contains any number of mustache variable tags. Tags are indicated by the double mustaches that surround them. `{{ person }}` is a tag.

input.name: variables
input.description: A map where keys are the variable names and values are the variable values.
